body: This light gray compass made of fine metal, and is engraved with various depictions of the sun, moon, and clouds. It allows a creature to increase or decrease the intensity of the wind four times per day as if using alter winds.
name: Wind-Caller Compass
url: pfsrd://Ultimate Equipment/Rules/Wondrous Items/Slotless/Slotless Wondrous Items/Wind-Caller Compass
